overview: After completion of this subject, students will have the knowledge to perform and interpret focused second and third trimester ultrasound assessment and will be competent in writing interpretive reports. Students will have interpreted and written a report on 10 online pregnancy ultrasound studies including commonly encountered pathology.
ilo: Identify the key steps required to acquire the standard views for focused ultrasound assessment of second and third trimester pregnancy.
Interpret and write a structured report of focused ultrasound images for assessment of second and third trimester pregnancy.
Evaluate the requirements for training, competence, and certification in focused second and third trimester pregnancy ultrasound.
generic_skills: Improved written skills and problem-solving skills

Prerequisites.content: Note: these can be taken concurrently (at the same time)

Inherent requirements (core participatio.content: Adequate visual acuity is required to interpret clinical ultrasound. A student is expected to demonstrate sufficient visual acuity to perform the required range of skills, including reading ultrasound images from a computer monitor.

assessment.brief: Interpretation of 10 case studies assessed by structured questions pertaining to each case
